title: If I get cs through kcet will they change my section?

comments.body: As far as i remember, they wont change your section, but in my batch(2021) some people could ask the management and get the sections changed ,this was beacuse they missed some classes since they came late(covid shit). So unless there is some good reason u need to change , they wont change.
No , i joined in r2 and my section stayed the same
